remarks: Any assignment of the generators to target elements can be extended (uniquely) to a homomorphism from a free monoid to an arbitrary other monoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
frgpup.b $e |- B = ( Base ` H ) $.
frgpup.n $e |- N = ( invg ` H ) $.
frgpup.t $e |- T = ( y e. I , z e. 2o |-> if ( z = (/) , ( F ` y ) , ( N ` ( F ` y ) ) ) ) $.
frgpup.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. Grp ) $.
frgpup.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
frgpup.a $e |- ( ph -> F : I --> B ) $.
frgpup.w $e |- W = ( _I ` Word ( I X. 2o ) ) $.
frgpup.r $e |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) $.
frgpuplem $p |- ( ( ph /\ A .~ C ) -> ( H gsum ( T o. A ) ) = ( H gsum ( T o. C ) ) ) $.
$d A y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d F y z $.
$d I y z $.
$d N y z $.
$d ph y z $.
